The practice followed by Government Departments during the War of issuing documents to,the press marked for publication not before a certain date should, as a general rule, cease. 2. An exoeption should usually be made in the case of long and detailed official documents cr communiques (which are not parliamentary papers) particularly those containing a mass Cf figures which cannot readily be telegraphed.
